phrs.translation: 使节的, 怎么翻译及发音

sentences.sentence: My ambassadorial duties will include introducing British visitors to the 120-plus pandas at Chengdu and others at a research in the misty mountains of Bifengxia.
sentences.translation: 我的大使职责包括向英国游客介绍成都的120多只大熊猫，以及在碧峰峡迷雾笼罩的群山中进行的一项研究中的其他熊猫。

sentences.sentence: Only two women hold ambassadorial rank.
sentences.translation: 只有两位妇女担任大使。

sentences.sentence: Eventually the two sides would upgrade their relations to ambassadorial level.
sentences.translation: 最终双方将彼此关系升级为大使级关系。
